name: The Pets - Adventure Game
description:
The pets is a new adventure game, you will be playing as a pig to beat the zombies.
the game is exciting and fun.

FEATURE

Beautiful graphics
Different pets to choose from
Different weapons
+17 unique levels
a variety of enemies and monsters

How to play

just follow the simple tutorial in the first scene of the game.

Download The Pets Now and let the adventure begin!
